Description:
Detects usage of special strings/null bits in order to potentially bypass AMSI functionalities

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential AMSI Bypass Script Using NULL Bits
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%if(0){{{0}}}' -f $(0 -as [char]) +%' or scriptblocktext like '%#<null>%')
